Description: Apex agreed to pay $10 million to support cleanup and remediation activities to settle allegations of petroleum contamination at its former refinery.
Petroleum Fuel & Terminal Co. agreed to pay $22,000 in settlement of alleged air pollution violations over two large asphalt storage tank fires.
